changelog:
### Whats New

- You can now clear the cache spaced used by the app by going to Settings > Clear cache
- You can now fetch all subtitles that belong to a specific language. i.e if a movie have subs: English 1, English 2, English SDH etc you can load them all to choose the one that sync's with the video
- Better error message whether if the server is down or if the movie/episode is not found
- Fixed bugs
